title: Геройчики
overview: The boy Roma loves to play, so his room is full of different toys. Who isn't here: the mysterious fluffy alien Bublik, and the brave pull-apart rooster Ko-Ko, and the noble samurai lizard O-Rush, and the cute doll Pinky, and the warlike plush bunny General De-Krol with his robots, and, of course, the brave superheroes Fly and Gloria. All these toys love games, fun, competitions, adventures and parties.When Roma is not in the room, they live their own exciting toy life. But if something happens to their beloved Roma, the Heroes immediately drop their plans and do everything possible to help him cope with troubles.
